content.text:
# Analysis of Main Target Image

## Count & Layers:
The structure consists of two main components with a total of 16 building blocks:

1. **Left Tower Component** (7 blocks)
   - 3 orange cylindrical blocks stacked vertically
   - 2 yellow rectangular blocks forming a crossbeam
   - 2 orange triangular roof blocks at the ends of the yellow crossbeam

2. **Right Frame Component** (9 blocks)
   - 2 vertical green rectangular blocks (pillars)
   - 3 yellow horizontal rectangular blocks (top, bottom, and middle)
   - 1 green horizontal rectangular block on the top yellow block
   - 1 blue cube on top of the green block
   - 1 orange triangular roof block inside the frame
   - 1 orange cylindrical block at the bottom
   - 1 green horizontal rectangular block as the base

## Spatial Relationships:
- The left tower has a central vertical orange cylindrical column
- The yellow crossbeam intersects the middle of this column
- The right frame forms a rectangular portal with an orange triangular block inside
- The frame sits on an orange cylinder which stands on a green base

# Selected Blocks from Dictionary

Based on the target structure, I need the following blocks:

- Blue cube (index 1) - 1 piece
- Green horizontal rectangular blocks (index 3) - 1 piece
- Green vertical rectangular blocks (index 4) - 2 pieces
- Green flat rectangular blocks (index 5) - 2 pieces
- Yellow horizontal rectangular blocks (index 6) - 3 pieces
- Yellow horizontal rectangular blocks (index 7) - 2 pieces
- Vertical orange cylindrical blocks (index 10) - 4 pieces
- Orange triangular roof blocks (index 14) - 3 pieces

# Assembly Order Instructions

```
{
  Step1: Move block with index 5 (Green base for right structure)
  Step2: Move block with index 10 (Orange cylinder for right structure)
  Step3: Move block with index 6 (Yellow horizontal block for bottom of frame)
  Step4: Move block with index 4 (Green vertical block for right side of frame)
  Step5: Move block with index 4 (Green vertical block for left side of frame)
  Step6: Move block with index 6 (Yellow horizontal block for top of frame)
  Step7: Move block with index 14 (Orange triangular roof inside frame)
  Step8: Move block with index 3 (Green horizontal block on top of frame)
  Step9: Move block with index 1 (Blue cube on top of frame)
  Step10: Move block with index 10 (Orange cylinder for bottom of left tower)
  Step11: Move block with index 10 (Orange cylinder for middle of left tower)
  Step12: Move block with index 7 (Yellow horizontal block for left crossbeam)
  Step13: Move block with index 7 (Yellow horizontal block for right crossbeam)
  Step14: Move block with index 14 (Orange triangular roof on left crossbeam end)
  Step15: Move block with index 14 (Orange triangular roof on right crossbeam end)
  Step16: Move block with index 10 (Orange cylinder for top of left tower)
}
```
